Custom application selected is always the opposite of default application, right?

      jabref/src/main/java/org/jabref/gui/externalfiletype/EditExternalFileTypeEntryDialog.fxml
    
    
         Line 38
      in

           <ToggleGroup fx:id="applicationToggleGroup" /> 
        
    
  


and not globally as in

  
    
      jabref/src/main/java/org/jabref/gui/preferences/EntryEditorTab.fxml
    
    
        Lines 14 to 17
      in
      d0393b5
    
    
    
    

        
          
           <fx:define>

If this does not work, then you can also try
customApplication.selectedProperty().bind(viewModel.defaultApplicationSelectedProperty().not());

Radio button in a toggle group dont support bidirectional binding.
